PackageOracle.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_ITEM_VNT_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_ITEM_VNT_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.42.968392000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,order_num IN VARCHAR2
,serv_id IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,order_num IN VARCHAR2
,serv_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref;

body.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_ITEM_VNT_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_ITEM_VNT_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.42.978519000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,order_num IN VARCHAR2
,serv_id IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_item_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref.add, parms=' || order_num || '|' || serv_id || '|' || bus_interact_item_id || '|' || bus_interact_item_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref a
(
a.order_num
,a.serv_id
,a.bus_interact_item_id
,a.bus_interact_item_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.order_num
,add.serv_id
,add.bus_interact_item_id
,add.bus_interact_item_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,order_num IN VARCHAR2
,serv_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref.del, parms=' || order_num || '|' || serv_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.order_num = del.order_num
AND a.serv_id = del.serv_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref.del');

END del;

END da_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref;
